overview:
Nishith Shah is the co-founder and Chief Technology Officer of Fab.com.

Nishith grew up in Vadodara, India, studied computer science at USC, Los Angeles and has now made Pune, India his home. Prior to Fab.com, he co-founded True Sparrow Systems with Deepa Shah, and socialmedian with Jason Goldberg. Whether it is software engineering or product design, Nishith is a believer in ‘form follows function’. You will find a big ‘Make Mistakes’ signage in his office.

At Fab, Nishith oversees all of the IT solutions that allow for members to be delighted when shopping on Fab online or through mobile apps.
